Comments_List: In this course, you learn how to evaluate H NMR spectra, use Scifinder, and continue using all the skills learned in the first orgo lab class.
The strength are the fact that each lab is very engaging and ties into the lecture course in some way. However, it can be a little repetitive, which isn't necessarily bad.
I would recommend this course if you've taken the first part of this lab and enjoyed it, since it basically continues with the same theme of synthetic chemistry.
